user.title: Users
user.message: Track's a users details and the their associated vacations.

store.title: Stores
store.message: Detailed information about the Marc's stores in the state of Ohio.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.message: Shows a visual display of a calendar with all of the users vacations.

block-dates.title: Block Dates
block-dates.message: List of dates that a user is not able to take a vacation on.

report.title: Reports
report.message: Report information of stores, users, and the users vacations.

request-tracker.title: Request Tracker
request-tracker.message: Tracks requested vacations and their review status.
